scan.title: Glucose Patch Scan
scan.description: Scan the patch to check your blood glucose levels

methods.title: Select Scan Method
methods.description: Choose one of the methods below to scan your glucose patch

camera.title: Scan with Camera
camera.description: Use your device camera to scan the patch in real-time

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.description: Upload a photo of the patch you’ve taken earlier

steps.1: Apply the patch to clean, dry skin
steps.2: Wait 2–3 minutes for the patch to react with sweat
steps.3: Select a scan method: use camera or upload patch image
steps.4: For camera scan: position the patch within the guide box and press the camera button
steps.5: For image upload: select a clear patch image and press "Analyze Image"

items.1: Ensure the patch sticks firmly to your skin
items.3: Avoid shadows on the patch during scanning
items.4: Hold the camera perpendicular to the patch
items.5: Wait a few minutes after applying the patch
items.6: For uploaded images, make sure the patch is clear and in focus

success.saveDescription: Your scan result has been saved to history.
success.reminderDescription: A reminder for your next scan has been set for 2 hours.

error.saveDescription: Failed to save scan result. Please try again.
error.processDescription: An error occurred while processing the scan.

staticNotes.normal: Your glucose level is within the normal range. The dominant normal color distribution indicates your blood glucose is well-controlled. Maintain your current healthy diet and lifestyle.
staticNotes.warning: The scan shows a slightly elevated glucose level with a significant warning color distribution. This may be an early sign that you should pay closer attention to your diet and physical activity. Monitor your glucose level regularly to track any changes.
staticNotes.high: The scan shows a high glucose level with a dominant high color distribution. This is an important signal to consult your doctor immediately. Factors such as food intake, stress, or lack of physical activity may contribute to this result.
staticNotes.unknown: Unable to determine glucose level accurately. Ensure the patch is applied properly, lighting is sufficient, and rescan for more accurate results.

informationCollection.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationCollection.description: We collect the following information to provide the best possible service:
items: Account information (email, name, profile photo)
Glucose patch scan data
Images of scanned patches
Chat history with the AI Assistant
Feedback and suggestions you provide

informationUsage.title: 2. How We Use the Information
informationUsage.description: The collected information is used to:
items: Provide glucose monitoring services
Offer personalized health insights
Store your examination history
Improve the accuracy of patch color detection
Provide technical support

dataSecurity.title: 3. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We are committed to protecting your data through:
items: Data encryption during transmission and storage
Secure Firebase authentication
Trusted image storage via Cloudflare R2
Restricted data access for app functions only
Regular security monitoring

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
informationSharing.description: We will NOT share your personal data with third parties, except:
items: With your explicit consent
To comply with legal obligations
In anonymized form for health research purposes

userRights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access your personal data stored by us
Update or correct your information
Delete your account and all related data
Download a copy of your data
Opt out of certain data uses

dataStorage.title: 6. Data Retention
dataStorage.description: Your data will be stored as long as your account remains active. After account deletion, your data will be permanently removed within 30 days, unless required by law to be retained longer.

policyChanges.title: 7. Policy Changes
policyChanges.description: We may update this policy from time to time. Significant changes will be notified through the app or via email.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at:
items: Email: dianova@gmail.com
Address: SMA Negeri 1 Matauli Dormitory, Jl. KH. Dewantara, Sibuluan Indah, Pandan District, Central Tapanuli Regency, North Sumatra 22538, Indonesia

overview.title: About Dianova
overview.description: Dianova is a blood glucose monitoring app that uses smart patch technology. The patch changes color based on glucose levels in sweat, and the app analyzes the color to estimate your glucose level.

step1.title: Patch Preparation
items: Clean the skin area where the patch will be applied
Make sure the skin is dry and free of oil
Avoid hairy or wounded areas
Choose an area that is easy to access for scanning

step2.title: Patch Application
items: Carefully remove the patch adhesive cover
Gently place the patch and press evenly
Make sure there are no air bubbles
Ensure the patch sticks firmly

step3.title: Waiting Time
items: Wait 2–3 minutes for the patch to react with sweat
Do not touch or move the patch
Keep the area dry and free from liquids
The patch will gradually change color

step4.title: Scanning with the App
items: Open the Dianova app and select "Scan Patch"
Ensure there is sufficient lighting
Align the patch within the guide frame
Tap the camera button to capture the image

step5.title: Result Interpretation
items: View the color analysis and glucose estimation result
Read the recommendations provided by the app
Save the result to your history records
Consult your doctor if necessary

lighting.title: Optimal Lighting
lighting.description: Use natural light or bright white lighting. Avoid yellow light or shadows.

cameraPosition.title: Camera Position
cameraPosition.description: Hold your phone perpendicular to the patch, about 10–15 cm away for best results.

avoidInterference.title: Avoid Interference
avoidInterference.description: Do not scan wet, dirty, or old patches (applied for more than 1 hour).

warning.title: Important Warnings
items: Dianova is not a certified medical device
Results are for reference only, not for medical diagnosis
Always consult your doctor for medical decisions
In emergencies, contact medical services immediately

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: If you experience any issues or have questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using the Dianova application, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use this application.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.description: Dianova is a blood glucose monitoring application that provides:
items: Glucose patch color detection using the camera
Glucose level estimation based on color analysis
Storage of examination history
AI Assistant for general health advice
Feedback and support system

medicalLimitations.title: 3. Medical Limitations
items: Dianova is NOT a certified medical device
Scan results are for reference only and DO NOT replace professional medical examinations
Always consult a doctor for diagnosis and treatment
Do not rely on this application for critical medical decisions
In case of emergency, contact medical services immediately

allowedUsage.title: 4. Permitted Use
items: Use the application for personal monitoring
Save and access your own scan data
Share results with healthcare professionals
Provide feedback for app improvement

prohibitedUsage.title: 5. Prohibited Use
items: Use the application for commercial purposes without permission
Modify, distribute, or create derivative works
Use the app to spread false medical information
Interfere with or damage the app’s functionality
Access other users’ data without authorization

accuracyReliability.title: 6. Accuracy and Reliability
accuracyReliability.description: While we strive to provide accurate results, we do not guarantee 100% accuracy in color detection or glucose estimation. Factors such as lighting conditions, camera quality, and patch condition may affect results.

userResponsibility.title: 7. User Responsibility
items: Using the patch according to the provided instructions
Ensuring optimal conditions during scanning
Keeping account credentials and passwords secure
Reporting any issues or bugs encountered
Using information responsibly

liabilityLimitation.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liabilityLimitation.description: Dianova and its developers are not liable for any losses or damages arising from the use of this application, including but not limited to medical decisions made based on app results.

serviceChanges.title: 9. Service Modifications
serviceChanges.description: We reserve the right to modify, discontinue, or restrict the service at any time, with or without prior notice.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.description: For questions regarding these Terms and Conditions:
items: Email: dianova@gmail.com
Support: dianova@gmail.com

main.title: Main Features
main.description: The Dianova app comes with advanced features for effective glucose monitoring.
items: Instant scan for glucose detection via patch
High-precision patch color detection
Upload patch images for deeper analysis
Real-time notifications for test results
Intuitive and user-friendly interface design

security.title: Security & Performance
security.description: The app is designed with top priority on data security and high performance.
items: End-to-end data encryption for maximum privacy
Secure Google authentication
Optimized for a wide range of Android devices
Automatic updates for the latest features
Battery-efficient performance

smartPatch.title: Smart Patch Technology
smartPatch.description: Dianova’s latest innovation — a smart patch for accurate glucose monitoring.
smartPatch.paragraph1: The Smart Patch Technology is an innovative solution that enables glucose monitoring through sweat. The patch reacts to glucose levels in your sweat by changing color, allowing accurate detection.
smartPatch.paragraph2: With the Dianova Android app, you can easily scan the patch using your phone’s camera, and our AI will analyze the result with high precision. The app intelligently manages data and memory usage, ensuring smooth and efficient performance across various Android devices.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Get personalized health insights from an AI that understands your condition.
aiAssistant.paragraph1: The Dianova app includes an AI Assistant that provides health tips based on your glucose monitoring results. It’s designed to recognize trends and patterns in your data, giving useful insights to help maintain your health.
aiAssistant.paragraph2: The AI Assistant can also remind you to perform regular checks and recommend healthy lifestyle habits tailored to your condition.

anonymousWarningModal.title: Anonymous Login Warning
anonymousWarningModal.description: By using anonymous login, you will experience the following limitations:
limitations: Scan history data cannot be recovered if the app is deleted

install.title: Install Dianova on Your iPhone

steps: Tap the Share icon at the bottom of Safari

guide.title: How to Install Dianova App on iPhone

step1.title: Step 1: Open Share Menu
step1.description: When opening the Dianova app in Safari, tap the Share icon located at the bottom of the screen.

step2.title: Step 2: Select "Add to Home Screen"
step2.description: Scroll down on the menu that appears and select the "Add to Home Screen" option.

step3.title: Step 3: Confirm Installation
step3.description: Tap the "Add" button in the top right corner to confirm installation.

complete.title: Done!
complete.description: You can now access the Dianova app directly from your iPhone home screen without having to open the browser first.
